TopicTitle: So... Has Anyone Else Seen This?

Articles.Content:
I was looking through some KSP files, and I seem to of found an extra, unused resource in the resources .CFG

If anyone wants a look, the resources file can be accessed through:

GameData/Squad/Resouces/ResourcesGeneric.cfg

It's the last one, right after Monopropellent... Its called "Testium"

Do you guys think this is some early testing of the mine-able resources coming in the next few updates?

Feel free to comment if you know anything about it, I'd really like to know.

Thanks For Reading!
There is a good chance that it is a test for the resource system. I find it amusing that the devs would make it testium.
Interesting,, Don't have a clue. like the name tho. maybe something they use for testing without having to worry about fuel types, oxidizers and air?
seeing that the devs have been talking a lot about minable resouces lately, it is most likely a test of the feature(P.S. if anyone can figure out how to obtain it, Props to you)
It is almost certainly a test, as it wasn't there in 0.19.1, and it being called testium and all that.
Nice find

Excerpt from resources file:

RESOURCE_DEFINITION

{

name = Testium

density = 0.3

flowMode = ALL_VESSEL

transfer = PUMP

color = 0.4 0.2 0.8

}

Why is it the only one with color? I asume it's a relative RGB, making it purple-ish.

Interesting.
I suspect this is the new resource for nuclear engines, which can only be found on eve, which is purple... explaining why testium is purple....

I think it's a test resource (duh) for the knowledge base/detector or other functionality of the resource mining system. Those do have colors assigned to them on the resource pie chart last time we saw it.
All right, whatever it is, I give a pickaxe to Jeb, land him randomly on the MÃƒÂ¼n, and won't bring him back until he brings me some of this Testium !

Why is it the only one with color? I asume it's a relative RGB, making it purple-ish.

Interesting.

It must be a test for the Eve resource.
There was a tread before the kraken attack about more of this kind. There must be more like this

It must be a test for the Eve resource.

Maybe Laythe too, weren't there talk about resources in the seas over there if I'm not mistaken?

I don't think so. I know the devs like to say Eves oceans are rocket fuel.

I don't think laythe has anything in it's oceans though. Maybe its surface?

I remember seeing screenshots of how the new resource detection system would look. On the surface of Kerbin were large areas in varying intensities of purple. I bet that testium was the resource used to create these tests on Kerbin.
I found that a few days ago and wondered about it. I just assumed it has always been there.
Testium is the ore form that's refined into Unobtanium.
It might be a placeholder for resources in the database.

Testium is the ore form that's refined into Unobtanium.

I see what you did there.

What about notimplementium?

I don't think so. I know the devs like to say Eves oceans are rocket fuel.

I don't think laythe has anything in it's oceans though. Maybe its surface?

Fair enough, didn't know about the rocket fuel actually, thanks for the heads up!

It must be a test for the Eve resource.

Launch the mining ship towards Eve ASAP!!

*miner hits space station*

ONWARDS!!

*miner hits a satellite*

TO VICTORY!!

*miner crashes into Eves oceans*

T_T

Testium? Really? Who names this stuff...
